trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Olympia
There were no other sightings in Olympia on or around June 9th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi just walked out the door and looked up and noticed something really bright and close. at first i thought i was looking at a satellite, then i noticed how bright and close it was. i watched it fly pass, not a super fast rate, but much faster then a plane. plus it was still light out which showed the outline of the sphere for about 4 minutes, then ascended\vanished. luckily a few minutes after i noticed a plane fly pass, which definitely allowed a comparison to the speed of the sphere to the jet's slower pace.
